[[Image:Tolkien Modding Community (Modding Comunity at ModDB.com).jpg|right|150px]]

The '''Tolkien Modding Community''' is a large online community of indepedent mod developers and modding teams, on the modding database and mod promotion website [[wikipedia:ModDB.com|ModDB.com]]. The community focuses on Tolkien-themed mods, addons and total conversions for a variety of video game titles across a plethora of game genres and game publishers. 

== External links ==
*[https://www.moddb.com/groups/tolkien-modding-community General overview of Tolkien-inspired mods at the Tolkien Modding Community] of [https://www.moddb.com/ ModDB.com]
